name: Expedition 13  - Silver Donator Package
detailed_description:
Thank you for looking into donating to Expedition 13. All donations go directly towards our development fund and makes sure we can put out content as fast as possible!

Please note that this DLC does not contain any ingame content although donators do get the following benefits:
- Thanks to your donation a developer doesn't starve this week!
- That lag free spessman adventure may come a little sooner than anticipated

short_description: Thank you for looking into donating to Expedition 13.. All donations go directly towards our development fund and makes sure we can put out content as fast as possible! Please note that this DLC does not contain any ingame content although donators do get the some benefits.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: 2ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IGPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
